nodes.text: A red dwarf was located in the Tertiary Usaita system, orbited by a sparse collection of dust and rock.

The star of the Tertiary Usaita system first appeared in the junior novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure, and was first pictured in the first part of the book's comic adaptation. When asked about the star's name since it was the only object in the system, writer Jason Fry suggested that the star was likely named Tertiary Usaita.
